info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 3 at 6:12PM EDT until July 3 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues.
* WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Orange and Seminole.
* WHEN...Until 800 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orlando, Apopka, Altamonte Springs, Ocoee, Winter Garden, Windermere, Pine Hills, Lockhart, Lake Apopka, Zellwood, Forest City, Orlovista, Fairview Shores, Universal Studios, Doctor Phillips, Eatonville, Clarcona, Paradise Heights, South Apopka and Plymouth. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING
